site.name: Plan → Do → Launch
site.purpose: SaaS onboarding optimization, AI automation, knowledge systems, and process architecture.

pages.title: Home — Plan → Do → Launch
pages.summary: Overview of PDL’s onboarding and delivery transformation approach, AI-powered tools, and the free PDL Analyzer assessment.
pages.value: Helps SaaS teams identify onboarding bottlenecks and implement scalable delivery systems.

pages.title: About Plan → Do → Launch
pages.summary: Background on John McDonald and the experience behind the PDL methodology for scalable onboarding and delivery.
pages.value: Communicates expertise and credibility behind the onboarding frameworks.

pages.title: AI Solutions
pages.summary: AI copilots, onboarding agents, workflow automation, and AI-enabled knowledge systems.
pages.value: Provides tools that automate onboarding tasks, support teams, and centralized knowledge.

pages.title: The Plan → Do → Launch System
pages.summary: Four-stage framework for designing, building, and scaling SaaS onboarding systems.
pages.value: Explains the core methodology used across all PDL engagements.

pages.title: Onboarding Services
pages.summary: Consulting services for onboarding optimization, process design, requirement mapping, and workflow transformation.
pages.value: Helps teams eliminate onboarding inconsistency and accelerate client time-to-value.

pages.title: Onboarding Engine
pages.summary: A complete onboarding transformation system including playbooks, automation, training, workflows, and portals.
pages.value: Provides everything needed to scale onboarding like a mature SaaS organization.

pages.title: OnboardIQ Portal
pages.summary: A client-facing onboarding portal with tasks, timelines, training, and real-time communication.
pages.value: Improves client clarity and reduces onboarding-related support overhead.

pages.title: Knowledge Systems
pages.summary: SOP creation, documentation architecture, and AI-searchable knowledge bases using Obsidian.
pages.value: Eliminates tribal knowledge and creates scalable documentation foundations.

pages.title: Case Studies
pages.summary: Real examples of onboarding transformation, automation gains, and measurable delivery improvements.

pages.title: Contact Plan → Do → Launch
pages.summary: Connect with John McDonald to discuss onboarding, automation, and process design needs.
pages.value: Provides a direct path into your inbound funnel.
